## What We Collect

- **Account information** (email, profile ‚Äî if you sign in)
- **OAuth data** (Google Drive access only when you explicitly allow it)
- **Usage logs** (browser/device info, IP, feature usage)
- **Error reports** (to improve reliability)

---

## How We Use Data

- Provide platform features  
- Support Google Drive integrations  
- Security, analytics, and debugging  
- Communication regarding your account or support issues  

---

## Google Drive Access

When connecting Google Drive via OAuth, Charaivati:
- Only uses the approved scopes  
- Does NOT access files without your explicit action  
- Does NOT transfer, sell, or store Drive content unnecessarily  
- Allows revocation at any time from Google Account settings
